alert.note: Alert for Adams; Blackford; Grant; Huntington; Jay; Wabash; Wells (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 01 at 9:21AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 AM EDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of northern Indiana, including the following counties, Adams, Blackford, Grant, Huntington, Jay, Wabash and Wells. * WHEN...Until 1115 AM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 900 AM EDT, trained weather spotters reported flooding in the advisory area due to heavy rain and thunderstorms overnight. Minor flooding is occurring. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations experiencing flooding include... Marion, Bluffton, Hartford City, Gas City, Berne, Upland, Fairmount, Dunkirk, Montpelier, Jonesboro, Sweetser, Swayzee, La Fontaine, Van Buren, Monroe, Pennville, Matthews, Sims, Warren and Lancaster. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.

area.areaDesc: Adams; Blackford; Grant; Huntington; Jay; Wabash; Wells
